Attacks.Name: Water Pulse
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Crunch
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, reduce the target character's Defense by 1 until the end of their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Ice Fang
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Freeze special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Torrent
Superpowers.Effect: When this character has 3 or fewer Stamina remaining, increase the Strength of its 'Water Pulse' attack by 2.

Superpowers.Name: Aqua Jet
Superpowers.Effect: Croconaw immediately makes a move action and may make an attack action after moving. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Attacks.Name: Aqua Tail
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is pushed away M distance from Croconaw.

Superpowers.Name: Rage
Superpowers.Effect: When this character takes damage, it gains 1 power.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Feraligatr character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
